title: Divisions of the Priests
summary: The priestly descendants of Aaron are divided into 24 groups for temple service. Each group takes turns serving. This system brings order and shared responsibility to the temple duties.

faq.question: How many priestly divisions were made?
faq.answer: Twenty-four divisions, each serving in turn at the temple.

faq.question: Why was this organization important?
faq.answer: It ensured a continuous and structured worship system in the temple.
